ygData.msgSnippet: Not to shabby Dewey, you made Megaton a little more agressive and not quite as cocky as I would ve but for not really knowing a character you played him pretty

Not to shabby Dewey, you made Megaton a little more agressive and not quite
as cocky as I would've but for not really knowing a character you played him
pretty well. Megaton is like Megatron, he's a sneaky, coniving, sweet
talking backstabber (And I don't mean a lawer.) Before challenging Mustex he
would have spoken to him first to see his intentions with the child. If they
worked with Megatons plans he'd "befriend" the bot until his usefullness was
over, then he'd either delete him or arange for someone else to do it
involentarily.

anyways now that we have the rivalry, and unfounded prejudice towards
mutants what now?
----- Original Message -----
From: <dewboy30816@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, July 17, 2001 3:05 PM
Subject: Re: angry


> That wasn't my entrance. My entrance was dubbed illegal.
>

> > apologies, but I don't live on the rpg). If you really feel like
> calling
